title: Cotilting modules and Gorenstein homological dimensions
authors: Kamran Divaani-Aazar, Ali Mahin Fallah and Massoud Tousi
abstract:
For a dualizing module $D$ over a commutative Noetherian ring $R$ with
identity, it is known that its Auslander class $\mathscr{A}_D\left(R\right)$
(respectively, Bass class $\mathscr{B}_D\left(R\right)$) is characterized as
those $R$-modules with finite Gorenstein flat dimension (respectively, finite
Gorenstein injective dimension). We establish an analogue of this result in the
context of cotilting modules over general Noetherain rings.
